birthday.name: birthday
birthday.title: Birthday Party
birthday.start_text: Our overlord is turning 231 and we want to offer a fabulous variety of food and booze. Can you get us some really interesting stuff to amuse the overlord?

outcomes.name: success
outcomes.end_text: Our overlord only ate 3 of our kind. Thank you for your help. Here, this is our famous choco latte. Legend says you should drink it with hot water.

outcomes.name: failure
outcomes.end_text: You return a little bit late and can't find the minion that gave you the quest. Asking around, no one seems to want to talk about it. Eventually you find a grumpy old man that tells you that all the minions have been eaten by the overlord, so don't bother looking for them. Yikes.

harvesting.name: harvesting
harvesting.title: Harvesting Resources
harvesting.start_text:
Welcome, do you want to make some money? 
Paradise needs a constant supply of Energy to keep our living standards up. I would get it myself, but I'm too busy enjoying the beach weather. 
Harvest some energy, then sell it at Paradise. I'll even give you a bonus!

outcomes.name: success
objectives_text: Return to Successful Merchant at Paradise.
outcomes.end_text: Well done. Here's some extra cash for your effort.

trading.name: trading
trading.title: Trading
trading.start_text: Trade between Paradise and Forge until you've sold 20 food/water to Forge and 10 metals to Paradise.

outcomes.name: success
objectives_text: Return to Successful Merchant at Paradise.
outcomes.end_text: Well done once more. Here's your money.

asteroid_mining.name: asteroid_mining
asteroid_mining.title: Asteroid Mining
asteroid_mining.start_text:
Mining asteroids can be very profitable.
Buy a mining laser, equip it, and you'll make money even faster.

outcomes.name: success
objectives_text: Return to Successful Merchant at Paradise.
outcomes.end_text: You're turning into quite a merchant yourself. If you keep this up, I might even be able to retire at 30!

mite_extermination.name: mite_extermination
mite_extermination.title: Mites, in space...?
mite_extermination.start_text: Look, I don't have time. Some crystal mites have been chewing up our machinery. Make yourself useful and I'll think about giving you more work.

outcomes.name: success
objectives_text: Buy and equip an impulse laser and a light armor.
Return to Forge Overseer at Paradise.
outcomes.end_text: I didn't think you'd do it so fast. Let's see what I can do for you.
